title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 6F.59 - Detour Signs (M4-8, M4-8a, M4-8b, M4-9, M4-9a, M4-9b. M4-9c, and M4-10
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 6F.59 - Detour Signs (M4-8, M4-8a, M4-8b, M4-9, M4-9a, M4-9b. M4-9c, and M4-10

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph. Option: 13A The M4-9 series signs may be used to guide motorists
straight ahead by modifying the arrow to point upwards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
6F.59

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
